name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi生誕祭2022 【ゲスト：ときのそら ⧸ 星街すいせい】 [y3Ed1eCwuOA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and Hoshimachi Suisei perform 'The Last Frontier'.
MC segment where AZKi introduces the next song.
AZKi and Hoshimachi Suisei perform 'Tenkyuu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide'.
scenes.song_name: Tenkyuu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide

subtitles.original: Whoa whoa...
subtitles.english: Whoa whoa...

subtitles.original: 道は別れ想い描いた
subtitles.english: I envisioned a fork in the road

subtitles.original: 風が冷たくて
subtitles.english: The wind was cold

subtitles.original: 晴れない灰色を街をただ
subtitles.english: Just looking out over the city

subtitles.original: 眺め続けていた
subtitles.english: In its unending grey

subtitles.original: 僕ら何を信じたら
subtitles.english: What should we have believed in?

subtitles.original: よかったんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder

subtitles.original: きっと立ち止まることは
subtitles.english: Surely, stopping

subtitles.original: 諦めることで
subtitles.english: Is the same as giving up

subtitles.original: でも忘れないように
subtitles.english: But so that I don't forget

subtitles.original: 君に言葉紡ぐから
subtitles.english: I'll spin words for you

subtitles.original: 超えて
subtitles.english: Going beyond

subtitles.original: The Last Frontier
subtitles.english: The Last Frontier

subtitles.original: 水平線の先 目指す場所まで
subtitles.english: Beyond the horizon, to our destination

subtitles.original: The Last Frontierの彼方 辿り着くまで
subtitles.english: Until we reach the end of the Last Frontier

subtitles.original: ばらばらに砕けた欠片をここに集めたわ
subtitles.english: I gathered the scattered fragments here

subtitles.original: 明日へ
subtitles.english: Towards tomorrow

subtitles.original: 息を
subtitles.english: Holding our

subtitles.original: 止めて
subtitles.english: breath

subtitles.original: さよならで別の運命が流れ落ちてゆく日に
subtitles.english: On the day another fate trickles down with a goodbye

subtitles.original: 会いに行く
subtitles.english: I'm coming to see you

subtitles.original: 強くこらえた夜明けはいつか終わるこの世界から
subtitles.english: From this world where the endured dawn will eventually end

subtitles.original: 愛を伝えにゆく
subtitles.english: I'm going to convey my love

subtitles.original: The Last Frontier
subtitles.english: The Last Frontier

subtitles.original: 君なら行ける
subtitles.english: If it's you, you can make it

subtitles.original: まだ見たことのない世界へ行ける
subtitles.english: You can go to a world you've never seen before

subtitles.original: 僕は観測する輝き止まぬ星の名を
subtitles.english: I observe the name of the star whose light never fails

subtitles.original: Remember The Frontier
subtitles.english: Remember The Frontier

subtitles.original: 愛する星たちへ捧げる歌を
subtitles.english: A song dedicated to the stars I love

subtitles.original: 光の最果て 旅立つ歌を
subtitles.english: A song for departing to the furthest edge of light

subtitles.original: ばらばらに砕けた欠片をここに集めたわ
subtitles.english: I gathered the scattered fragments here

subtitles.original: 明日へ
subtitles.english: To tomorrow

subtitles.original: 帰るから
subtitles.english: Because I'm returning

subtitles.original: 響かせよう 僕ら今を
subtitles.english: Let our present moment resonate

subtitles.original: 歌う
subtitles.english: We sing

subtitles.original: 次はこの曲！
subtitles.english: Next is this song!

subtitles.original: すいちゃんの、「天球、彗星は夜を跨いで」！
subtitles.english: Suichan's "Celestial Sphere, Comets Straddle the Night"!

subtitles.original: 二人で歌いたいと思います！
subtitles.english: We're going to sing it together!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: 灯りがひとつ灯った 灯った
subtitles.english: A single light flickered on, flickered on

subtitles.original: 天を彩った秒が綺麗だ
subtitles.english: The seconds that painted the heavens were beautiful

subtitles.original: 僕の吐いた白い息のように 消してしまえたらな
subtitles.english: I wish I could erase it like the white breath I exhaled

subtitles.original: 押し殺して深く沈んだ
subtitles.english: Stifled, it sank deep

subtitles.original: 泣き声さえ聞こえているから
subtitles.english: Because I can even hear the sobbing

subtitles.original: 君を刺した万目雲 僕の青色で塗り潰して
subtitles.english: Overwhelming clouds that pierced you, I'll paint over them with my blue

subtitles.original: 全部涙になって 星の海の中へ出て行った
subtitles.english: It all turned to tears and went out into the sea of stars

subtitles.original: 果てない闇の中に そっとハを添えたら
subtitles.english: If I softly add a breath into the endless darkness

subtitles.original: 彗星が僕たちの街を飛んだ
subtitles.english: A comet flew over our city

subtitles.original: 誰もいない夜の空を飛んだ
subtitles.english: It flew across the empty night sky

subtitles.original: 不確かに静まった街の中へ
subtitles.english: Into the city that had fallen uncertainly silent

subtitles.original: 降り注ぐのは誰の悲しみだろう
subtitles.english: Whose sorrow is it that's raining down?

subtitles.original: 星はまだ弧を描いて飛んだ
subtitles.english: The star still flew, drawing an arc

subtitles.original: 靄の彼方 姿を離して
subtitles.english: Letting go of its form beyond the haze

subtitles.original: いつかまた会えるなんて言えなかった
subtitles.english: I couldn't say that we'd meet again someday

subtitles.original: 星が降った朝の街 僕は
subtitles.english: In the city where stars fell in the morning, I...
